column1: Little Goat Diner////Ordered off the vegan menu.   The server suggested the nachos.  I could have made these at home as all it was was chips
column2: guac and smothered in field greens.   The smoked fries were cold.  My colleagues seemed to like their dishes
column3: so perhaps I ordered the wrong thing?   To make matters worse
column4: my dish took 5 minutes longer (?) than everyone else's?  Granted the restaurant was very busy.   It just is not that special.   Count me out on coming back!
